channel.title: Project Terrorwars {Beta Testers Wanted}
channel.description:
[size=20pt]PROJECT TERRORWARS V.2[/size] Needs you Help!!!
[img]http://www.your-images.org/pics/82f5ffd8e6841117d87c62b5cb045324.gif[/img]
Owner and Creator : Terrordog
[img]http://img353.imageshack.us/img353/7741/cavedungeonmf8.png[/img]
[img]http://img454.imageshack.us/img454/4338/swampdungeonsc3.png[/img]
Im looking for 3-5 Beta testers that can test while i am coding! These beta testers will automaticly been VIPPed and Modded (ingame,and forum) Vip status is worth 300k Runescape cash so i think its worth it!
To subscribe as a Beta tester you must :
-Have MSN
-Be able to be online 1-2 hours a day
-Have 1 month knowledge of rs private serving
-Be trustfull
-Be able to download a file and edit your moparscape cache folder -----------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Project Terrorwars {Beta Testers Wanted}
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“parke5, post:3, topic:104191”]Id be happy to try. I have my own server which has ran for 2+ months, and I have msn and im always on, but idk about editing a chache[/quote]a cache is the folder that holds all the item,objects,npc,everything that u can see my server uses cache 377 so a normal moparscape cache would disconect when entering the server because it cannot render the new objects/items/npc and places that the server is asking for thats why u need to edit urs whit mine ure cache only gets better nothing changes u can only do more.

the winrar file u download comes whit a instruction its 1 minute of work and after ure done ure ready to connect,if u have fear it may be a keylogger wich i understand around this forums u can scan it whit every antivirus u have and place the logs here confirming it is 100% virus,spyware,adware free[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 05:07:43 PM[/size][hr][quote=“learner, post:4, topic:104191”]i have all of those and i would like to help you as soon as possible add my msn justin1248@hotmail.com[/quote]added u on msn when u coming online ?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 05:12:38 PM[/size][hr][quote=“parke5, post:3, topic:104191”]Id be happy to try. I have my own server which has ran for 2+ months, and I have msn and im always on, but idk about editing a chache[/quote]whats ure msn so i can add u

Read full topic
